entry.title: Catching Up
entry.content:
It’s been a while, and I’ve been slacking. Playing a bit of Diablo 3: Reaper of Souls in my downtime when I should have been coding. To be fair, it’s been crazy at work with a lot of migrations away from Lotus Notes into Exchange/Outlook. Next on the agenda: Active Directory binding! To practice, I should brush up on dsconfigad.

Some goals I’ve solidified over the past month:

Practice French.
Practice Ruby.
Practice DevOps (with Puppet or Casper or something…).
Get back in touch with my n00b web development roots.

That final goal, I’m meeting by deploying this blog from my computer at work, too. I’ve been too lazy to bring my personal computer into work lately, and I’ve been without a full setup of this blog (Octopress doesn’t natively push my source branch?).

Whatevs. Off to email JAMF to see if they’ll hook me up with a trial of Casper Suite. :D
